******************************************************************* Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}

Your patience has been truly appreciated. Recently, you were affected by an issue regarding theme store previews. A fix has been released. This issue is now resolved. You can now preview your store with each theme.
To update your affected orders, simply change the status from "Pending" to "Awaiting Fulfillment". This will place the order back in the appropriate order section.
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
